cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB name to an invalid string 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors during startup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the gNB name to an invalid string 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing errors during startup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 gNB 名稱設定為無效字串 'invalid' 會在啟動期間導致配置解析錯誤。
